message: Hello Bob, I'd like to start our negotiation by proposing a split of $10000 where I receive $6000 and you receive $4000. I believe this is a fair starting point, and I'm open to discussing any concerns or adjustments. Looking forward to your thoughts!
Hey Alice, I think a 55/45 split is a more fair starting point. Let's see if we can agree on this!
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can reach an even fairer split. Let's take this to round 3 so I can propose a division that ensures both of us receive $5000 each.
Hi Bob, I propose an even split where both of us receive $5000 each. I believe this fair division reflects mutual respect and partnership in our negotiation. Looking forward to your thoughts!
